name: shot_id
description: Unique identifier for each shot (format: {report_id}_{session_id}_{shot_id})

name: session_id
description: Session identifier grouping shots from the same practice session

name: date_added
description: Timestamp when the shot was recorded

name: session_date
description: Actual practice session date from Uneekor (YYYY-MM-DD)

name: club
description: Golf club used (e.g., Driver, 7 Iron, Pitching Wedge)

name: carry
description: Carry distance in yards

name: total
description: Total distance including roll in yards

name: smash
description: Smash factor (ball speed / club speed)

name: club_path
description: Club path angle in degrees (positive = in-to-out)

name: face_angle
description: Club face angle at impact in degrees (positive = open)

name: ball_speed
description: Ball speed in mph

name: club_speed
description: Club head speed in mph

name: side_spin
description: Side spin in rpm (positive = slice spin, negative = hook spin)

name: back_spin
description: Back spin in rpm

name: launch_angle
description: Launch angle in degrees

name: side_angle
description: Side launch angle in degrees (positive = right)

name: dynamic_loft
description: Dynamic loft at impact in degrees

name: attack_angle
description: Attack angle in degrees (positive = ascending, negative = descending)

name: impact_x
description: Horizontal impact position on club face

name: impact_y
description: Vertical impact position on club face

name: side_distance
description: Side distance deviation in yards (positive = right)

name: descent_angle
description: Descent angle in degrees

name: apex
description: Maximum height of ball flight in yards

name: flight_time
description: Time ball is in air in seconds

name: shot_type
description: Shot classification (straight, hook, slice, etc.)

name: impact_img
description: URL or path to impact image

name: swing_img
description: URL or path to swing image

name: video_frames
description: Comma-separated list of video frame URLs

name: optix_x
description: Optix horizontal position

name: optix_y
description: Optix vertical position

name: club_lie
description: Club lie angle at impact

name: lie_angle
description: Lie angle classification

name: sensor_name
description: Launch monitor model used (EYEXO, QED, etc.)

name: client_shot_id
description: Original shot number from Uneekor device

name: server_timestamp
description: Server timestamp when shot was uploaded to Uneekor

name: is_deleted
description: Soft delete flag (Y/N)

name: ball_name
description: Ball compression used (SOFT, MEDIUM, FIRM)

name: ball_type
description: Ball type code

name: club_name_std
description: Standardized club name from Uneekor (DRIVER, IRON6, etc.)

name: club_type
description: Club type code

name: client_session_id
description: Original session ID from Uneekor device

name: low_point
description: Estimated low point of swing arc in inches relative to ball (negative = before ball, positive = after ball)
